meanings.definition: Able to change easily or frequently
meanings.sent1: The proteans weather in our city can go from sunny to rainy in a matter of minutes.
meanings.sent2: She had a proteans personality, always adapting to new situations with ease.
meanings.sent3: The proteans chameleon decided to blend in with a group of colorful flowers for fun.
meanings.sent4: His proteans talent for mimicry made him the star of the school play.
meanings.sent5: The proteans nature of the market kept investors on their toes.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that can assume many different forms or roles
meanings.sent1: In the play, the proteans actor effortlessly switched between various characters.
meanings.sent2: The proteans of the movie industry often play different roles in each film.
meanings.sent3: The proteans of the animal kingdom, the octopus, amazed everyone with its ability to change colors.
meanings.sent4: The proteans of the fashion world, the model, could transform into any style with ease.
meanings.sent5: The proteans of the forest, the owl, could be both a predator and a symbol of wisdom.
